blogPost.excerpt: ❤️ Open source 🤖 Native 🔌 Plugin system ⌨️ Custom hotkeys ⬆️ Sort options by frequency of use 📦 Small size (less than 20mb) Spotter is a productivity tool, the main function is to search and launch applications actions and applications themselves.
blogPost.body: ❤️ Open source 🤖 Native 🔌 Plugin system ⌨️ Custom hotkeys ⬆️ Sort options by frequency of use 📦 Small size (less than 20mb) Spotter is a productivity tool, the main function is to search and launch applications actions and applications themselves.
blogPost.title: Spotter - Productivity tool that allows you to launch everything
blogPost.author: Denis

localize.description: ❤️开源 🤖原生 🔌插件系统 ⌨️自定义热键 ⬆️按使用频率排序选项 📦体积小(小于20mb)Spotter是一个生产力工具，主要功能是搜索和启动应用的动作和应用本身。
localize.tagline: 生产力工具，允许你启动一切

localize.description: ❤️開源 🤖原生 🔌插件系統 ⌨️自定義熱鍵 ⬆️按使用頻率排序選項 📦體積小(小於20mb)Spotter是一個生產力工具，主要功能是搜索和啓動應用的動作和應用本身。
localize.tagline: 生產力工具，允許你啓動一切

previous.excerpt: The Box Timer is a free and simple workout timer that works just like the timer at your local box. It is perfect for workouts at home, outside or at your box.
previous.title: The Box Timer - A simple workout timer

localize.description: 盒子计时器是一个免费和简单的锻炼计时器，它的工作原理就像你当地盒子的计时器一样。它是完美的锻炼在家里，外面或在你的盒子。
localize.tagline: 一个简单的锻炼计时器

localize.description: 盒子計時器是一個免費和簡單的鍛鍊計時器，它的工作原理就像你當地盒子的計時器一樣。它是完美的鍛鍊在家裏，外面或在你的盒子。
localize.tagline: 一個簡單的鍛鍊計時器

next.excerpt: SocialProofed is the easy way to embed Instagram feeds, Facebook reviews, and Google testimonials on your website...in just 60 seconds!
next.title: SocialProofed - Make commerce a social experience.

localize.description: SocialProofed是在您的网站上嵌入Instagram feeds、Facebook评论和谷歌推荐的简单方法......只需60秒！您只需在您的网站上嵌入Instagram feeds、Facebook评论和谷歌推荐。
localize.tagline: 让商业成为一种社交体验。

localize.description: SocialProofed是在您的網站上嵌入Instagram feeds、Facebook評論和谷歌推薦的簡單方法......只需60秒！您只需在您的網站上嵌入Instagram feeds、Facebook評論和谷歌推薦。
localize.tagline: 讓商業成爲一種社交體驗。
